astrologer:Strike.NAME: Strike
astrologer:Strike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL astrologer:Solar: Deal !M! additional damage.

astrologer:Defend.NAME: Defend
astrologer:Defend.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL astrologer:Lunar: Gain !M! additional Block.

astrologer:Stardust.NAME: Stardust
astrologer:Stardust.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to the current astrologer:Stellar_Phase. Draw a card.
astrologer:Stardust.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to the current astrologer:Stellar_Phase. Draw !M! cards.

astrologer:Alignment.NAME: Alignment
astrologer:Alignment.DESCRIPTION: Add X copies of the bottom card of your draw pile to your hand. They cost X less this combat. NL Exhaust.
astrologer:Alignment.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add X + !M! copies of the bottom card of your draw pile to your hand. They cost X + !M! less this combat. NL Exhaust.

astrologer:Perihelion.NAME: Perihelion
astrologer:Perihelion.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL astrologer:Solar: Deal !M! times as much damage instead.

astrologer:Sunrise.NAME: Sunrise
astrologer:Sunrise.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Increase the maximum astrologer:Stellar_Phase by !M!. NL astrologer:Solar: Double this card's effect.

astrologer:Premeditation.NAME: Premeditation
astrologer:Premeditation.DESCRIPTION: Draw the bottom card of your draw pile, then play and Exhaust it.

astrologer:Shine.NAME: Shine
astrologer:Shine.DESCRIPTION: Play a card in your hand twice and Exhaust it. NL Exhaust.

astrologer:CrystalBall.NAME: Crystal Ball
astrologer:CrystalBall.DESCRIPTION: Choose an enemy. At the start of each of its turns, if its intent is the same as its current intent, it loses !M! HP. NL Exhaust.

astrologer:Wish.NAME: Wish
astrologer:Wish.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less [E] for each astrologer:Star card Exhausted this combat. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! cards.
astrologer:Wish.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less [E] for each astrologer:Star card Exhausted this combat. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! cards.

astrologer:NewMoon.NAME: New Moon
astrologer:NewMoon.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL astrologer:Lunar: Increase the damage and Block of the drawn cards by !M! for the rest of combat.

astrologer:Moonlight.NAME: Moonlight
astrologer:Moonlight.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL astrologer:Lunar: Draw a card.
astrologer:Moonlight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL astrologer:Lunar: Draw !M! cards.

astrologer:Eclipse.NAME: Eclipse
astrologer:Eclipse.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL astrologer:Lunar: Apply !M! Weak.

astrologer:Radiance.NAME: Radiance
astrologer:Radiance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL astrologer:Solar: Apply !M! Vulnerable.

astrologer:Still.NAME: Still
astrologer:Still.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL The astrologer:Stellar_Phase cannot change for 2 turns.

astrologer:SolarFlare.NAME: Solar Flare
astrologer:SolarFlare.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! astrologer:Starlit and trigger it once.

astrologer:ReadTheStars.NAME: Read The Stars
astrologer:ReadTheStars.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each astrologer:Star in your hand.

astrologer:GlassStar.NAME: Glass Star
astrologer:GlassStar.DESCRIPTION: astrologer:Star. NL Exhaust the next card you play and gain Block equal to !M! times its cost.

astrologer:Observe.NAME: Observe
astrologer:Observe.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to the number of cards in your draw pile.
astrologer:Observe.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to the number of cards in your draw pile + !M!.

astrologer:StarOfRegret.NAME: Star Of Regret
astrologer:StarOfRegret.DESCRIPTION: astrologer:Star. NL Deal !D! damage. NL When this card is Exhausted, deal twice as much damage to ALL enemies.

astrologer:StarOfChange.NAME: Star Of Change
astrologer:StarOfChange.DESCRIPTION: astrologer:Star. NL Ethereal. NL When this card is drawn, Exhaust a card in your hand and add a random card to your hand. It costs 0 this turn.
astrologer:StarOfChange.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: astrologer:Star. NL Ethereal. NL When this card is drawn, Exhaust a card in your hand and add a random upgraded card to your hand. It costs 0 this turn.

astrologer:FrozenStar.NAME: Frozen Star
astrologer:FrozenStar.DESCRIPTION: astrologer:Star. NL The next time you play a astrologer:Star card, gain !M! Block.

astrologer:LonelyStar.NAME: Lonely Star
astrologer:LonelyStar.DESCRIPTION: astrologer:Star. NL Ethereal. NL When this card is drawn, draw !M! cards.

astrologer:ShiningStar.NAME: Shining Star
astrologer:ShiningStar.DESCRIPTION: astrologer:Star. NL Ethereal. NL When this card is drawn, apply !M! astrologer:Starlit to a random enemy.

astrologer:FadingStar.NAME: Fading Star
astrologer:FadingStar.DESCRIPTION: astrologer:Star. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.

astrologer:NeutronStar.NAME: Neutron Star
astrologer:NeutronStar.DESCRIPTION: astrologer:Star. NL Apply X astrologer:Starlit. NL Deal !D! damage for each stack of astrologer:Starlit the enemy has.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: (Deals !M! damage.) NL astrologer:Star. NL Apply X astrologer:Starlit. NL Deal !D! damage for each stack of astrologer:Starlit the enemy has.

astrologer:ShootingStar.NAME: Shooting Star
astrologer:ShootingStar.DESCRIPTION: astrologer:Star. NL Draw a card. NL When this card is Exhausted, add a copy of it to your draw pile.
astrologer:ShootingStar.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: astrologer:Star. NL Ethereal. NL Draw a card. NL When this card is Exhausted, add a copy of it to your draw pile.

astrologer:SpaceDust.NAME: Nebula
astrologer:SpaceDust.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !B! Block. NL When this card is Exhausted, add a copy of it to your draw pile.

astrologer:Cataclysm.NAME: Cataclysm
astrologer:Cataclysm.DESCRIPTION: When this card is drawn, reduce its cost by 1 for the combat. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

astrologer:Fireball.NAME: Fireball
astrologer:Fireball.DESCRIPTION: astrologer:Star. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! astrologer:Starlit.

astrologer:StarOfCourage.NAME: Star of Courage
astrologer:StarOfCourage.DESCRIPTION: astrologer:Star. NL Exhaust all non-Attack cards in your hand. Gain !M! Strength for each card Exhausted.

astrologer:StarOfMisfortune.NAME: Star of Misfortune
astrologer:StarOfMisfortune.DESCRIPTION: astrologer:Star. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable.

astrologer:Prestidigitation.NAME: Prestidigitation
astrologer:Prestidigitation.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw !M! card and put !M! card on the bottom of your draw pile.

astrologer:Retelling.NAME: Retelling
astrologer:Retelling.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle your hand into your draw pile, then put that many cards from your discard pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.
astrologer:Retelling.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle your hand into your draw pile, then put that many plus !M! cards from your discard pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.

astrologer:Divination.NAME: Divination
astrologer:Divination.DESCRIPTION: Put a card from your hand onto the bottom of your draw pile. NL Draw !M! cards.
astrologer:Divination.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put any number of cards from your hand onto the bottom of your draw pile. NL Draw !M! cards.

astrologer:RejectReality.NAME: Reject Reality
astrologer:RejectReality.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle !M! Dazed into your draw pile.

astrologer:Conjunction.NAME: Conjunction
astrologer:Conjunction.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL When this card is drawn, gain !B! Block.

astrologer:Opposition.NAME: Opposition
astrologer:Opposition.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL When this card is drawn, deal !D! damage to a random enemy.

astrologer:Trine.NAME: Trine
astrologer:Trine.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL When this card is drawn, the next card you play this turn is played twice.

astrologer:Sextile.NAME: Sextile
astrologer:Sextile.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL When this card is drawn, put a copy of a card in your hand onto the top of your draw pile.

astrologer:Quincunx.NAME: Quincunx
astrologer:Quincunx.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL When this card is drawn, a random enemy loses !M! Strength this turn.

astrologer:Novile.NAME: Novile
astrologer:Novile.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL When this card is drawn, gain [E].
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL When this card is drawn, gain

astrologer:BlackHole.NAME: Black Hole
astrologer:BlackHole.DESCRIPTION: Purge all cards in your Exhaust pile. NL Deal !D! damage for each Purged card. NL Exhaust.
astrologer:BlackHole.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Purge all cards in your Exhaust pile. NL Deal !D! damage for each Purged card. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Purge all cards in your Exhaust pile. NL Deal !D! damage for each Purged card. NL Exhaust. NL (Deals !M! damage.)
Retain. NL Purge all cards in your Exhaust pile. NL Deal !D! damage for each Purged card. NL Exhaust. NL (Deals !M! damage.)

astrologer:MeteorShower.NAME: Meteor Shower
astrologer:MeteorShower.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

astrologer:CometStrike.NAME: Comet Strike
astrologer:CometStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust a random card in your hand.
astrologer:CometStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust a card in your hand.

astrologer:HeatDeath.NAME: Heat Death
astrologer:HeatDeath.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust ALL your astrologer:Stars. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for each card Exhausted. NL Exhaust.

astrologer:Fate.NAME: Fate
astrologer:Fate.DESCRIPTION: The next [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] card played this turn will be active. NL Exhaust.
astrologer:Fate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The next [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] card played this turn will be active.

astrologer:TheFool.NAME: The Fool
astrologer:TheFool.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] !STELLAR!: Exhaust.

astrologer:TheMagician.NAME: The Magician
astrologer:TheMagician.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal damage equal to the number of cards played this combat. NL [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] !STELLAR!: Play a random card from your draw pile.
astrologer:TheMagician.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to the number of cards played this combat. NL [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] !STELLAR!: Play a random card from your draw pile.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal damage equal to the number of cards played this combat. NL (Deals !D! damage.) NL [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] !STELLAR!: Play a random card from your draw pile.
Deal damage equal to the number of cards played this combat. NL (Deals !D! damage.) NL [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] !STELLAR!: Play a random card from your draw pile.

astrologer:TheHighPriestess.NAME: The High Priestess
astrologer:TheHighPriestess.DESCRIPTION: [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] !STELLAR!: Double the base damage of a card in your hand for the combat. NL Exhaust.
astrologer:TheHighPriestess.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] !STELLAR!: Double the base damage of a card in your hand for the combat. NL Exhaust.

astrologer:TheEmpress.NAME: The Empress
astrologer:TheEmpress.DESCRIPTION: [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] !STELLAR!: ALL enemies lose HP equal to the total amount of damage they intend to deal.

astrologer:TheEmperor.NAME: The Emperor
astrologer:TheEmperor.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn. NL [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] !STELLAR!: Enemy loses three times as much Strength. NL Exhaust.

astrologer:TheHierophant.NAME: The Hierophant
astrologer:TheHierophant.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Dexterity. At the end of the turn, lose !M! Dexterity. NL [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] !STELLAR!: Remove all debuffs. NL Exhaust.

astrologer:TheLovers.NAME: The Lovers
astrologer:TheLovers.DESCRIPTION: Exchange the costs of two cards in your hand for the rest of combat. NL Exhaust. NL [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] !STELLAR!: The chosen cards will be played twice the next time you play them.

astrologer:Strength.NAME: Strength
astrologer:Strength.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Exhaust. NL [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] !STELLAR!: Gain !M! Strength for each enemy in combat.

astrologer:TheHermit.NAME: The Hermit
astrologer:TheHermit.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each card played this turn. NL [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] !STELLAR!: Draw a card from the bottom of your draw pile. It costs 1 less this turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each card played this turn. NL (Gain !M! Block.) NL [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] !STELLAR!: Draw a card from the bottom of your draw pile. It costs 1 less this turn.

astrologer:WheelofFortune.NAME: Wheel of Fortune
astrologer:WheelofFortune.DESCRIPTION: Lose 10 Gold. NL [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] !STELLAR!: Play !M! random [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] cards. Their [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] effects are triggered.

astrologer:Justice.NAME: Justice
astrologer:Justice.DESCRIPTION: ALL creatures gain !B! Block. NL [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] !STELLAR!: ALL enemies lose HP equal to double their current Block.

astrologer:TheHangedMan.NAME: The Hanged Man
astrologer:TheHangedMan.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a card this turn, the enemy loses !M! HP. [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] !STELLAR!: Draw 3 cards.

astrologer:Death.NAME: Death
astrologer:Death.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] !STELLAR!: Kill the target non-boss enemy.

astrologer:Temperance.NAME: Temperance
astrologer:Temperance.DESCRIPTION: [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] !STELLAR!: Heal HP equal to the number of [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] cards in your deck. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] !STELLAR!: Heal HP equal to the number of [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] cards in your deck. NL Exhaust. NL (Heal !M! HP.)

astrologer:TheDevil.NAME: The Devil
astrologer:TheDevil.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this does not kill the enemy, lose 6 HP. NL [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] !STELLAR!: Deals additional damage equal to your missing health.

astrologer:TheTower.NAME: The Tower
astrologer:TheTower.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] !STELLAR!: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! additional times.

astrologer:TheStar.NAME: The Star
astrologer:TheStar.DESCRIPTION: astrologer:Star. NL Deal damage equal to the current astrologer:Stellar_Phase to ALL enemies. NL [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] !STELLAR!: Deals twice as much damage.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: astrologer:Star. NL Deal damage equal to the current astrologer:Stellar_Phase to ALL enemies. NL [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] !STELLAR!: Deals twice as much damage. NL (Deals !D! damage.)

astrologer:TheMoon.NAME: The Moon
astrologer:TheMoon.DESCRIPTION: astrologer:Lunar: Draw cards until your hand is full. NL [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] !STELLAR!: Gain !B! Block for each card drawn.

astrologer:TheSun.NAME: The Sun
astrologer:TheSun.DESCRIPTION: astrologer:Star. NL astrologer:Solar: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] !STELLAR!: ALL enemies lose !M! HP.

astrologer:Judgement.NAME: Judgement
astrologer:Judgement.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] !STELLAR!: If this kills a non-minion enemy, reduce its cost by !M! permanently.

astrologer:TheWorld.NAME: The World
astrologer:TheWorld.DESCRIPTION: [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] !STELLAR!: Play all of the cards in your exhaust pile.
astrologer:TheWorld.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL [#ccf3ff]Stellar[] !STELLAR!: Play all of the cards in your exhaust pile.

astrologer:Starfield.NAME: Astral Form
astrologer:Starfield.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL ALL your cards are astrologer:Stars.

astrologer:Prismatic.NAME: Prismatic
astrologer:Prismatic.DESCRIPTION: The first time you play a astrologer:Star each turn, apply !M! astrologer:Starlit to a random enemy.

astrologer:Premonition.NAME: Premonition
astrologer:Premonition.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw an Ethereal card, draw a card.

astrologer:DarkMatter.NAME: Dark Matter
astrologer:DarkMatter.DESCRIPTION: The first time a card is Exhausted each turn that is not a Status or Curse, add a copy of it to your draw pile.
astrologer:DarkMatter.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL The first time a card is Exhausted each turn that is not a Status or Curse, add a copy of it to your draw pile.

astrologer:Nova.NAME: Nova
astrologer:Nova.DESCRIPTION: Trigger astrologer:Starlit !M! time at the end of your turn.
astrologer:Nova.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Trigger astrologer:Starlit !M! times at the end of your turn.

astrologer:Confirmation.NAME: Confirmation
astrologer:Confirmation.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle an *Ominous *Star into your draw pile. NL Whenever you draw an *Ominous *Star, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

astrologer:Glimpse.NAME: Glimpse
astrologer:Glimpse.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw an Ethereal card, gain !M! Block.

astrologer:CosmicExpanse.NAME: Cosmic Expanse
astrologer:CosmicExpanse.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a astrologer:Star, increment the astrologer:Stellar_Phase.

astrologer:Pulse.NAME: Pulse
astrologer:Pulse.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL When this card is drawn, deal !D! damage and apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

astrologer:Nescience.NAME: Nescience
astrologer:Nescience.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the cost of ALL your cards to 1 this combat. NL Exhaust.
